data.title: Closings, Cancellations, & Delays
data.text:
Please be advised that the Arundel Olympic Swim Center will be closed for maintenance from August 24, 2024, to September 8, 2024.

The playground at Bell Branch Park will be receiving a new rubber surface and will be closed for about one week, starting on Monday, October 7, 2024.

Starting March 11, 2024, Brooklyn Height Park will be closed to the public through the Spring of 2025 for park improvement projects. For more information on the park improvements, please visit Brooklyn Heights Park project updates.

Starting on Thursday, July 25, 2024, the pickleball courts will be closed for approximately 10 days, weather permitting, for court repairs.

Due to mechanical issues, the comfort station at Fort Smallwood Park is closed for repairs. The beach will remain open.

The playground at Fort Smallwood Park will be closed starting Monday, September 23, 2024, to construct a new playground. Please be advised that the new playground will be available in approximately three weeks.
